backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access control, user profiles, projects, tasks, preferences, and various statistics with permission checks and ordered-map storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old task structures to new nullable projectId format while preserving all other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components with test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files describing major components, views, and hooks.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint configuring metadata, icons, manifest, and bootstrapping the main React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining metadata, icons, theme colors, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/service-worker.ts: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, cache cleanup, and offline fallback logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, section routing, theme setup, service worker registration, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/CreateProjectDia: Dialog component for creating a new project with name, icon, and color selection, submitting via useCreateProject.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Form dialog to create a task with title, description, due date, project selection, and priority, using backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Displays empty-state messaging for no projects or tasks and optionally opens the CreateProjectDialog.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header managing navigation, date controls, view modes, drawer toggle, and user profile/logout menu.
frontend/src/components/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows completed tasks with search, sorting, project lookup, and optional task selection callback.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Manages PWA install prompts for different platforms, handling dismissal, installation, and display logic.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Presents a branded login screen with feature highlights and an Internet Identity authentication button.
frontend/src/components/LongFormTaskEdit: Provides a rich text editor for long-form task content using ReactQuill with a configured toolbar.
frontend/src/components/MainContent.tsx: Renders day, week, or month views based on the selected view mode and passes date/task interaction props.
frontend/src/components/OverviewPage.tsx: Fetches and displays productivity insights, stats, and loading states with various summary cards.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal prompting the user to enter their name and save their profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProjectsOverview: Shows a list of projects with expand/collapse, task fetching, project actions, and project creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Empty placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Displays a task card with completion toggle, edit/delete actions, task metadata, and optional selection behavior.
frontend/src/components/TaskDrawer.tsx: Sidebar drawer listing active tasks with search, quick-add, and selection; integrates task creation and project lookup.
frontend/src/components/TaskEditDialog.t: Modal dialog for editing a task’s fields including title, description, due date, project, and priority.
frontend/src/components/TaskPage.tsx: Full-page task editor showing details and long-form content with save handling and project display.
frontend/src/components/views/DayView.ts: Displays tasks for a single day grouped by overdue, upcoming, and completed, with task creation support.
Renders a month calendar grid with per‑day task previews, overdue indicators, and day/task navigation.
frontend/src/components/views/WeekView.t: Shows a week-by-day layout with tasks sorted by priority and date, plus quick task creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth client state, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for calling backend APIs for user profiles, projects, and tasks, using the current actor and auto‑invalidating caches.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, dark mode rules, scrollbar styling, and Quill editor styling overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, themes, animations, and plugins such as typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements and planned features for supporting unassigned tasks and default dates in quick-add flow.
